entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
